line.text: Can my love excuse the slow offence
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Of my dull bearer when from thee I speed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: From where thou art why should I haste me thence
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Till I return of posting is no need
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O what excuse will my poor beast then find
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When swift extremity can seem but slow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then should I spur though mounted on the wind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In winged speed no motion shall I know
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then can no horse with my desire keep pace
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Therefore desire (of perfect love being made)
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Shall neigh (no dull flesh) in his fiery race
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But love for love thus shall excuse my jade
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Since from thee going he went wilful-slow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Towards thee Ill run and give him leave to go
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
